name: @rtaa/ingest-service
description: WebSocket ingestion service for PCM16 audio frames

scripts.prebuild: if [ ! -d ./lib/pubsub ]; then rm -rf ./lib && mkdir -p ./lib && (cp -R ../../lib/pubsub ./lib/pubsub 2>/dev/null || echo 'Note: lib/pubsub not found at ../../lib/pubsub - ensure it is copied by Dockerfile or build context'); fi
